scripts.precommit: npm run docs && git add documentation && npm run create-index && git add module/index.js
scripts.istanbul: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha  -- -R nyan --report lcov --compilers js:babel/register --ui qunit ./tests
scripts.coverage: npm run compile; npm run istanbul; npm run clean
scripts.coveralls: npm run compile && npm run istanbul  && (cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js || true) && npm run clean
scripts.prepublish: npm run create-index; npm run compile
